alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 5:20AM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. The Upper Weiser Basin and Baker County valleys will see totals of 4 to 8 inches through Saturday. In the West Central and Boise Mountains total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches in mountain valleys with 15 to 30 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph today and Friday. * WHERE...Portions of west central Idaho and northeast Oregon. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ this morning to 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A break in the snow is possible Friday night before more snow arrives on Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
